com.acrelec.completesdk

Class CompleteEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrelec.completesdk.CompleteEngine

  • public class CompleteEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    CompleteEngine class is a singleton class which provides access to the API methods. Use the getInstance() to get an instance of the class and init() to initialize.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CompleteEngine.onLocationUpdatedListener
      Interface for location update callback.

      Interface for site request callback.

      Interface for sites requested callback.
      static interface  CompleteEngine.onSmsSentListener
      Interface for Sms callback
      static interface  CompleteEngine.onTripCancelledListener
      Interface for trip cancellation callback.

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.String locale,
                 Units units)
        Initializes CompleteEngine. Must be called prior to making any other calls instance methods.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context for retrieving LocationManager instance.
        key - API Key.
        locale - Language to use for return location time estimates.
        units - Units to use for return location distance estimates.

      • getSite

        public void getSite(java.lang.String siteId)
        Retrieves Site by site_id and calls onSiteRequestedListener callback.
        Parameters:
        siteId - site_id of site

      • getSites

        public void getSites()
        Retrieves list of all active sites and calls onSitesRequestedListener callback.

      • registerTrackingIdentifier

        public void registerTrackingIdentifier(RegisterRequest request)
        Registers tracking identifier with service and calls onRegisterTrackingListener callback.
        Parameters:
        request - RegisterRequest with site, device and tracking identifier data.

      • startTracking

        public void startTracking()
        Starts tracking device location and sending updates to Acrelec Complete web api using last registered tracking identifier, device information and site, calling onLocationUpdateListener callback.

      • stopTracking

        public void stopTracking()
        Stops tracking device location.

      • updateLocation

        public void updateLocation(android.location.Location location)

      • cancelTrip

        public void cancelTrip()
        Cancels trip of last registered site, tracking identifier and device, calls onTripCancelledListener callback.

      • SendSmsMessage

        public void SendSmsMessage(SmsMessage message)
        Sends SMS message values to Acrelec Complete web api to send an sms message to specified number and message.
        Parameters:
        message - sms message
